contentrichtext.text: {{Taxobox | image = Ceramic fungus (363448878).jpg | image_width = 240px | image_caption = ''Xylobolus frustulatus'' | regnum = [[Fungus|Fungi]] | divisio = [[Basidiomycota]] | classis = [[Agaricomycetes]] | ordo = [[Russulales]] | familia = [[Stereaceae]] | genus = '''''Xylobolus''''' | genus_authority = [[P.Karst.]] (1881) | type_species = ''Xylobolus frustulatus'' | type_species_authority = ([[Pers.]]) [[Jacques Boidin|Boidin]] (1958) | subdivision_ranks = Species | subdivision = ''[[Xylobolus annosus|X. annosus]]''<br> ''[[Xylobolus frustulatus|X. frustulatus]]''<br> ''[[Xylobolus hiugensis|X. hiugensis]]''<br> ''[[Xylobolus illudens|X. illudens]]''<br> ''[[Xylobolus princeps|X. princeps]]''<br> ''[[Xylobolus spectabilis|X. spectabilis]]''<br> ''[[Xylobolus subpileatus|X. subpileatus]]''<br> ''[[Xylobolus thoenii|X. thoenii]]'' }} '''''Xylobolus''''' is a [[genus]] of [[fungi]] in the [[Stereaceae]] family. The ''Dictionary of the Fungi'' (10th edition, 2008) estimated the genus to contain three widely distributed species;<ref name=Kirk2008/> another, ''[[Xylobolus thoenii|X. thoenii]]'', was added in 2011.<ref name=Tura2011/> The genus was circumscribed by [[Petter Karsten]] in 1881.<ref name=Karsten1881/> ==References== {{Reflist|refs= <ref name=Karsten1881>{{cite journal |author=Karsten P. |title=Symbolae ad mycologiam Fennicam. VIII |journal=Meddelanden af Societas pro Fauna et Flora Fennica |year=1881 |volume=6 |pages=7â€“13 |language=Latin}}</ref> <ref name=Kirk2008>{{cite book |author=Kirk PM, Cannon PF, Minter DW, Stalpers JA. |title=Dictionary of the Fungi |edition=10th |publisher=CABI |location=Wallingford, UK |year=2008 |page=739 |isbn=978-0-85199-826-8}}</ref> <ref name=Tura2011>{{cite book |author=Tura DA, Zmitrovich IV, Wasser SP, Spirin WA, Nevo E. |title=Biodiversity of the Heterobasidiomycetes and non-gilled Hymenomycetes (former Aphyllophorales) of Israel |series=Biodiversity of cyanoprocaryotes, algae and fungi of Israel |publisher=Gantner Verlag |location=Ruggel |year=2011 |pages=323 |isbn=978-3-906166-99-5}}</ref> }} ==External links== *{{IndexFungorum|18770}} [[Category:Russulales]] {{Russulales-stub}}
